resources.string: View legal info, status, software revision & much more
Smart Digital wellbeing and parental controls
If you limit background activity for an app, it might misbehave and intentionally do some weird stuffs
Basic visuals, lowest battery usage on longer terms
Sharpest visuals, more battery usage on longer terms
Improved visuals, moderate battery usage on longer terms
Choose your preferred resolution, some running apps might even close unexpectedly if you change the system resolution.
